channel.title: CDN on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in CDN on Machine Learning

item.title: DNS & CDN Service Provider Comparison
item.description: DNS # nameisp # free for its own domains full features masked url NO catch-all email (can use mailgun) namecheap # free for any domain full features masked url dynamic D-DNS (using client) catch-all email forwarding dnspod # free for any domain limited TTL range NO masked url ($) free WAF often slow or timeout (pushing users to $) NO catch-all email (can use mailgun) CDN # Baidu & cloudflare are sharing the same nodes world wide (cooperation).
